name: Ancient Race
description:
Install instructions

On an ancient planet in ancient times, ancient aliens enslaved a race of ancient rock people and forced them to race and battle with ancient technology for the amusement of their alien masters.

Race against other ancient rock creatures to be the fastest, hardest, rockin-est one around.

Supports
1-4 Players locally.

One level.

To Install:

Unzip and run. Only tested on windows 7.

If using keyboard:

WASD/Arrows move, Space/Enter jumps; Mouse/Q/E to use items.

Gamepad:

Stick Movement, A/B Jump, Most other buttons are mapped to "use items".
